metadata.title: CVE-2018-10289 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MuPDF 1.13.0, there is an infinite loop in the fz_skip_space function ofthe pdf/pdf-xref.c file. A remote adversary could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
